participant_1.background:
I enjoy sharing the recipes I've collected from my mother and daughters with others.
I'm a pretty short guy, but I make up for it with my big personality.
i am a gentle giant.
I like dressing up for special occasions, but I prefer to wear comfortable clothing on a regular day.
I fear that my family will be judged for the way they are.

participant_2.background:
I have a close relationship with my family and enjoy sharing my memories and seashells with them.
I'm from the Midwest, but I love exploring new places and meeting new people.
I went kayaking on a beautiful lake during my last vacation.
I went to the beach and relaxed.
i love to read and relax by the lake on the weekends.

content.text: Hi! It's going great, I just got back from my vacation.
Oh that sounds fun! Where did you go?
I went to the beach and relaxed. I also went kayaking on a beautiful lake.
That sounds amazing! I love the beach and kayaking.
I do too! I also love reading and relaxing by the lake on the weekends.
Me too! I love to read books and listen to music.
I love music too! I'm from the Midwest, but I love exploring new places and meeting new people.
Oh that's cool! I'm from the East Coast, but I also love exploring new places and meeting new people.
I'm glad to hear that! I love to learn about different cultures and make new friends.
Me too! I think it's important to be open-minded and accepting of others.
I agree! I think it's important to be kind and compassionate to everyone, regardless of their background.
I completely agree! I think it's important to treat others the way you want to be treated.
I agree! I think it's important to live your life with integrity and honesty.
I completely agree! I think it's important to be true to yourself and to others.
